name: The Wicker
description:
The Wicker is an experimental Survival Horror experience that uses primarily environmental feedback to communicate the state of the game to players. 

Players must escape a pursuing spirit, while attempting to find and place the eye into the stone socket. Navigating through a storm of suspended cubes which slow movement on contact, players are armed with the ability to clear tunnels in the cubes, and place light throughout the arena. 

Faintly in the distance players hear the song of the eye who longs for a return to its socket... but only while the player faces the correct direction. 

It is the players job to bring the eye and socket together, and put The Wicker at ease. But beware, the spirit lurks nearer.
